DataElement.preferredName: Person Suspected Clinical Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator regarding information related to the likely diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Suspected Clinical Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the likely diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Suspected Clinical Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Believed likely.:A diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease. (On-line Medical Dictionary):Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have suspect
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have suspected ovarian, fallopian tube, primary peritoneal carcinomas or advanced stage papillary serous uterine carcinoma?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have clinically and radiographically suspected, previously untreated, FIGO stage III or IV epithelial ovarian, primary peritoneal or fallopian tube cancer?

DataElement.changeDescription: released as part of draft content review; SD 12/21/15
